sections.heading: Nonforfeiture Law for Life Insurance; how cited
sections.text: Sections 44-407 to 44-407.09 and 44-407.24 to 44-407.26 shall be known as the Standard Nonforfeiture Law for Life Insurance.SourceLaws 1943, c. 106, § 5, p. 363;R.S.1943, § 44-407;Laws 1965, c. 262, § 3, p. 736;Laws 1979, LB 354, § 3;Laws 1981, LB 355,

44-407.Standard Nonforfeiture Law for Life Insurance; how cited.

Sections 44-407 to 44-407.09 and 44-407.24 to 44-407.26 shall be known as the Standard Nonforfeiture Law for Life Insurance.

SourceLaws 1943, c. 106, § 5, p. 363;R.S.1943, § 44-407;Laws 1965, c. 262, § 3, p. 736;Laws 1979, LB 354, § 3;Laws 1981, LB 355, § 2.

sections.heading: 44-407 to 44-407.09 and 44-407.24 to 44-407.26 shall be known as the Standard Nonforfeiture Law for Life Insurance.
sections.text: 44-407 to 44-407.09 and 44-407.24 to 44-407.26 shall be known as the Standard Nonforfeiture Law for Life Insurance.
